primitiveValues.textValue: Have you uploaded your wire receipt? Ndax Wire

ConversationMessageDefinition.label: Have you uploaded your wire receipt? Ndax Wire

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
1. Login to our mobile app

  2. Tap on the wallet icon on the bottom toolbar

  3. Select the FIAT tab

  4. Tap on CAD or USD

  5. Tap DEPOSIT, then enter the amount you are looking to deposit

  6. Select WIRE TRANSFER

  7. Copy the information provided and initiate a wire transfer from your online banking platformâ€™s website or in the branch with the information provided

  8. Once you send the wire transfer from your financial institution, scroll to the bottom of where you left off in the Ndax app, and click on UPLOAD RECEIPT

  9. Upload a copy of your wire receipt

  10. Click on DEPOSIT once finished

  11. Typically, it takes 0-1 business day for a wire transfer to land from your bank and into your NDAX CAD wallet.
